name: ESiJobs
0:
”Alexa, ask ESI Jobs about the company”
”Alexa, ask ESI Jobs about benefits”
”Alexa, ask ESI Jobs to find me a job”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. s. i. jobs
des: This skill helps people find out about Engineering Solutions Inc. (ESi), its benefits, and to help find a job there. Asking about ESi or the company produces a brief description. Asking about benefits allows you to get a benefit overview and highlights, and to drill into the details on specific benefits. And finding a job actually performs an interview! After a few basic questions, you can filter jobs results using keywords to get the results you want. Then you can have a link to the results texted to your phone!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
